effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Raises the user’s Attack by two stages if it KOs the target.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Raises the user’s Attack by two stages if it KOs the target.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Raises the user’s Attack by two stages if it KOs the target.

short_effect.sun_moon: Raises the user’s Attack by two stages if it KOs the target.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Raises the user’s Attack by two stages if it KOs the target.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Raises the user’s Attack by two stages if it KOs the target.

flavor_text.sun_moon: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user’s Attack stat rises drastically.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user’s Attack stat rises drastically.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user’s Attack stat rises drastically.
